item.name: Product
item.description: APIs for Product Related Apis,Create Product,Product Attributes list,Product Delete

request.description: This endpoint allows you to filter products by brand, size, color, condition, material, and price range.

formdata.description: The ID of the product to update. Required if updating an existing product.
The name of the product.
The ID of the category to which the product belongs.
The ID of the default pickup location.
The ID of the product brand.
The ID of the product  size.
The ID of the product material.
The ID of the product condition.
The ID of the product color.
The ID of the product's suitable category.
The description of the product.
The type of cloth for the product.
The stock quantity of the product.
The price of the product.

request.description: This function handles the creation or update of a product, including its main image and additional product images.

request.description: This function handles the creation or update of a product, including its main image and additional product images.

variable.description: The ID of the product image to delete.

request.description: This function deletes a product image by its ID if it exists in the database.

item.name: Delete a product if it is not approved.

variable.description: The ID of the product to delete.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a product based on the given ID if the product has not been approved (`is_approved` = 0).

item.name: Get User's Products by Approval Status

query.description: Filter products by approval status. Use 'approved' to retrieve approved products. If not provided, unapproved products will be returned.

request.description: This function retrieves the current user's products based on the approval status.
